Text.Page:
Hey! Don't just stay indoors all winter!

I'm Ambrrr, the Wintera messenger. Come find {@linkcreature:63#9004#me} in Velika and I will let you in on the best-kept secret of winter: the exciting Wintera battle!
You can enjoy this game for a short time while Wintera lasts, so don't delay!

——Ambrrr

You came!

Are you ready to learn about our Wintera snowball battle?
